bcbioRNASeq

  • News

bcbioRNASeq

Quality control and differential expression for bcbio RNA-seq experiments.

Installation

This is an R package.

Bioconductor method

source("https://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
biocLite("hbc/bcbioRNASeq")

devtools method

install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("hbc/bcbioRNASeq")

Examples

HTML reports rendered from the default RMarkdown templates included in the package.

  • Quality control
  • Differential expression
